nodes.text: Harlan was a young Human female who joined the New Jedi Order.
She may have been one of the original twelve students at Luke Skywalker's Jedi Praxeum on Yavin 4.

In The Jedi Academy Sourcebook, Harlan was an "example PC character" for illustrative purposes. On the StarWars.com Message Boards, Leland Chee has stated that "I don't believe she was intended to be an actual in-universe character." She is included in the Wookieepedia for completeness.
